text: Was Jose Mourinho right?: Unpacking the lows of Dele Alli’s football career.
translated: Ṣé Jose Mourinho ló tọ̀nà?: Ó ń ṣí àwọn ohun tó burú jù lọ nínú eré ìtàgé Dele Alli.
backtranslated: Is Jose Mourinho right?: He exposes the worst aspects of Dele Alli's play.

text: Rema's Calm Down falls off Billboard Hot 100 after setting new record.
translated: Rema's Calm Down já kúrò nínú Billboard Hot 100 lẹ́yìn tí ó fi àkọsílẹ̀ tuntun sílẹ̀.
backtranslated: Rema's Calm Down dropped off the Billboard Hot 100 after it released a new record.

text: 'I have always wanted a girl' - Rihanna opens up on pressure of raising two sons.
translated: Rihanna sọ pé: "Mo ti fẹ́ láti ní ọmọbìnrin kan nígbà gbogbo".

translated: Àtúnṣe ipele 2: Presido kéde àwọn ààlà tuntun fún Gúúsù Áfíríkà láti dènà Coronavirus.

text: 'What kind of nonsense is that?' - Prophet descends on GRNMA.
translated: 'Kí ni irú ọ̀rọ̀ òmùgọ̀ yẹn?' - Wòlíì sọ lórí ìkànnì GRNMA.
backtranslated: 'What is that nonsense?' - The prophet says on GRNMA.

text: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast Cote coach slams Nigeria for being overly defensive.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Olùkọ́ Ivory Coast Cote dá Nàìjíríà láre pé ó ń dáàbò bo ara rẹ̀ ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Coach Ivory Coast Cote confirmed Nigeria's defense was above expectations.

text: DKB and DJ Slim lock horns online.
translated: DKB àti DJ Slim ń lo ìsọfúnni lórí ìkànnì.
backtranslated: DKB and DJ Slim are using social media.

translated: Dókítà Àpọ́sítélì Amagashie kìlọ̀ fáwọn ọkùnrin pé kí wọ́n má ṣe máa ṣe ìfẹ́, ó sì sọ pé ó ṣeé ṣe kí wọ́n ní àrùn jẹjẹrẹ.

text: Police arrest alleged serial motorbike thief.
translated: Àwọn ọlọ́pàá mú ẹni tó ń jí kẹ̀kẹ́ àfiṣelé.
backtranslated: The police arrested the thief of a bicycle.

text: FIFA imposes transfer ban on Hearts of Oak over unsettled $150,000 debt.
translated: FIFA fòfin de ìwẹ̀fà fún Hearts of Oak nítorí pé ó ti ní gbèsè tó tó ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ààbọ̀ [150,000] dọ́là.
backtranslated: FIFA banned the acquisition of Hearts of Oak because it had a $150,000 debt.

text: 'Mickey Mouse' boxer toasts Cape Verde's first Olympic medal.
translated: Olùkọ́ ìjàmbá 'Mickey Mouse' ń fi ère ìkọ́kọ́ tí Cape Verde gba ní ìdíje Òlíńpíìkì rúbọ.
backtranslated: Boxing trainer Mickey Mouse is offering the Cape Verdean Olympic medal.

text: APP leader reacts after court throws out injunction against Akwatia by-election.
translated: Olórí APP ṣe ohun tó sọ lẹ́yìn tí ilé ẹjọ́ ti pàṣẹ fún wọn pé kí wọ́n máà yan àwọn èèyàn láti ṣe ìdìbò àgbègbè Akwatia.
backtranslated: The head of the APP did what he said after the court ordered them not to vote in the Akwatia region.

text: Igbo leader addresses land acquisition allegations, apologises to Ghanaians.
translated: Olórí Igbo sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àwọn ẹ̀sùn tó fi kàn án pé ó ti ra ilẹ̀, ó sì tọrọ àforíjì lọ́wọ́ àwọn ará Ghana.
backtranslated: The Igbo chief spoke about the allegations he had made of buying land and apologized to the Ghanaians.

text: Bukom Arena gets face-lift to host Basketball games.
translated: Ó ní kí ilé ìṣọ́ Bukom Arena máa ṣe eré ìje ìkọ́gbá.
backtranslated: He invited the Bukom Arena to host the final.

text: Afenyo-Markin apologises to Prof Ayensu-Danquah over 'strangely, you get a ministerial appointment' comment.
translated: Afenyo-Markin tọrọ àforíjì lọ́wọ́ Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Ayensu-Danquah nítorí àlàyé tó sọ pé, 'ó jọ pé o ní ìbò òṣìṣẹ́.'
backtranslated: Afenyo-Markin apologized to Professor Ayensu-Danquah for his comment, 'You seem to have a vote of no confidence.'

text: Asawa National Open Championship slated for June 19.
translated: Asawa National Open Championship ti a ṣeto lati waye ni Oṣu Kẹrin Ọjọ 19.
backtranslated: Asawa National Open Championship is scheduled to be held on April 19.

text: Enforce maternity-friendly workplace policies - Samuel Atidzah.

text: GEC Open returns to Ghana.
translated: GEC Open padà sí Gánà.
backtranslated: GEC Open returned to Ghana.

translated: 'Láti ìrọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ títí di ìwádìí títí di ìgbẹ́jọ́' - Azar ké pe IGP lórí ìtìlẹ́yìn òṣìṣẹ́ ilé iṣẹ́ NPP kan.
